name: GUEST IN HOUSE
query:
Select
  `tabInn Reservation`.name as "Reservation:Link/Inn Reservation:120",
  `tabInn Reservation`.status as "Status:Select/Status:100",
  `tabInn Reservation`.customer_id as "Customer:Link/Customer:200",
  `tabInn Reservation`.actual_room_id as "Room:Link/Inn Room:100",
  `tabInn Reservation`.room_type as "Room Type:Data:100",
  `tabInn Reservation`.arrival as "Arrival:Datetime:150",
  `tabInn Reservation`.departure as "Departure:Datetime:120",
  `tabCustomer`.mobile_no as "Phone:Data:150"
From
   `tabInn Reservation` Join `tabCustomer` on `tabInn Reservation`.customer_id = `tabCustomer`.name
